service_intro: Professional web services for your business?
Looking for a developer who can bring your vision to life and take your digital presence to the next level?
Whether you need a brand new website, a custom e-commerce solution, or a seamless user experience, I'm here to help.
services_we_offer: Here are some of the services I offer:
ecommerce_desc: We build powerful and user-friendly e-commerce solutions tailored to your needs.
uiux_desc: A beautiful and user-friendly design is crucial for a positive experience.
maintenance_desc: Having a website is just the beginning â€“ it needs to be updated and secure.
maintenance_details: âš¡ Optimization for faster load times

contact.title: First contact
description: We schedule a meeting together.
In this initial step, we establish a connection and set up a discovery call to understand your requirements, goals, and expectations.
We discuss your business, target audience, and what you hope to achieve with the website.

consultation.title: Initial Consultation
description: We discuss your needs and vision.
During this phase, we go in-depth about your project requirements, design preferences, and any specific features you want.
We explore your brand identity, competitors, and industry trends to ensure your website stands out.

planning.title: Planning
description: We create a detailed plan and timeline.
A project roadmap is developed, including deliverables, milestones, and deadlines.
We define the siteâ€™s structure, user experience (UX) strategy, and technical specifications.
A sitemap and wireframes may be created to outline the layout and flow of the website.

design.title: Design
description: We design a prototype for your feedback.
We create high-fidelity mockups or interactive prototypes to visualize the website's look and feel.
Color schemes, typography, and UI elements are carefully chosen to align with your brand.
You provide feedback, and we make revisions as needed before proceeding.

development.title: Development
description: We build the website based on the approved design.
Frontend and backend development take place, turning designs into a fully functional website.
Features like animations, forms, databases, and integrations (e.g., payment gateways, APIs) are implemented.
The website is built to be mobile-friendly, fast-loading, and SEO-optimized.

testing.title: Testing
description: We thoroughly test the website.
Comprehensive testing is conducted, including functionality, responsiveness, cross-browser compatibility, and security checks.
Bugs and performance issues are identified and resolved to ensure a seamless user experience.
We conduct user testing and collect feedback for final adjustments.

launch.title: Launch
description: We launch the website and ensure everything works.
The website is deployed to a live server, making it accessible to users.
Final performance checks, speed optimizations, and security reinforcements are performed.
We monitor the launch closely to ensure a smooth transition.

maintenance.title: Maintenance
description: We provide ongoing support and maintenance.
Regular updates, security patches, and backups are performed to keep the website running smoothly.
We offer continued support for bug fixes, content updates, and feature enhancements.
Analytics and performance reviews help optimize the site over time.
